channel.title: CLI on YoSQL - write more SQL
channel.description: Recent content in CLI on YoSQL - write more SQL

item.title: CLI
item.description: Download the latest release Write .sql files in a directory of your choice (e.g. /path/to/your/sql/files) Call java -jar yosql-cli.jar --inputBaseDirectory /path/to/your/sql/files --outputBaseDirectory /output/path
